book.title: 败坏了哈德莱堡的人 The Man that Corrupted Hadleyburg
book.description: 简介： The Man That Corrupted Hadleyburg is a piece of short fiction by Mark Twain. It first appeared in Harper's Monthly in December 1899, and was subsequently published by Harper Collins in the collection The Man That Corrupted Hadleyburg and Ot...
